Form.text: After reading the instructions, click the "Begin Entry" button below to enter the DV Program.

Begin.text: The entry form is prepared in two parts, one for the primary Entrant and one for derivatives (if any). Each part must be completed correctly and completely before going to the next part. After all parts are completed, the entry will be submitted to the DV-2025 Processing Center. Click the link below to begin the entry process.
Begin.title: Entry Form

Entry.text: Please read the DV-2025 Entry Instructions carefully. Entrants may be disqualified for not completing the entry form correctly or by submitting more than one entry. Use the link below to view the instructions.
Entry.title: Entry Instructions

Photo.text: Before beginning the entry process, verify that your picture and pictures for any dependents fully comply with DV entry photo requirements included in the DV-2025 instructions. Your case will be disqualified if you submit a non-compliant photo.  For examples of acceptable photos, click the button below.
Photo.title: Photo Instructions

Welcome.text:
Our State Department Web site for the 2025 Diversity Visa Program
          (DV-2025) is now open. The entry submission period for DV-2025 is from
          12:00PM EDT (GMT -4) on October 4, 2023 to 12:00PM EST (GMT -5) on
          November 7, 2023. The entry form will only be available for submission
          during this period and this period only. Entries will NOT be accepted
          through the U.S. Postal Service.
Welcome.title: Welcome

Form.heading: Electronic Diversity Visa Program

StatusCheck.text:
DV-2025 Entrants may enter their confirmation information through
        the link below starting at noon (EDT) on May 4, 2024. The DV-
        2025 registration period opens on October 4, 2023, and closes on
        November 7, 2023. DV-2025 Entrants should keep their
        confirmation number until at least September 30, 2025.
StatusCheck.title: DV Entrant Status Check

Banner.text: We will officially register you in the American DV Lottery program and provide reliable support.
Banner.title: Greencard DV-2025 Registration Period

Layout.title: Green Card Application Services
Layout.description: Looking to submit a Green Card application? Our online service simplifies the process for individuals from all over the world. Apply now! Apply for a US Green Card from anywhere, whether you're in the US or Uzbekistan. Our platform streamlines the application process.Get started on your path to a Green Card with our user-friendly online submission system. Apply for permanent residency hassle-free.

Card1.text: Registration on the official DV website is only available in the autumn season, but you can fill out the application form at any time of the year through our website.
Card1.title: Registration throughout the year

Card2.text: You can fill out the form on our website in Uzbek. We will fill in all your information in the English version for the official application form.
Card2.title: We will fill out the questionnaire in English

Card3.text: If you win, we will help you with all the necessary issues, relying on our many years of experience. We will not spare our advice until you go to America.
Card3.title: We give advices

Card4.text: After preparing for the interview in our company, you will pass the interview successfully.
Card4.title: We will fill out the form for you, taking into account all the necessary nuances!

Card5.text: You can fill out the form on our website in Uzbek. We will fill in all your information in the English version for the official application form.
Card5.title: We will fill out the questionnaire in English

Card6.text: If you win, we will help you with all the necessary issues, relying on our many years of experience. We will not spare our advice until you go to America.
Card6.title: We give advices

Note.title: I agree to the <Link>conditions</Link> of participation in the lottery.
Note.warningText: Attention! There is a fee for filling out the Green Card form through the site. A family application is 120,000 soums, a single application is 90,000 soums. Payment must be made through Click & Payme after completing the form. Forms without payment will not be registered.

Timer.text: Attention! Fill out the form only in the Latin alphabet!
Timer.title: Green Card lottery application form for 2024

dataOfPassport.label: Your passport details (serial number and expiry date)

AddChild.label: Enter information about children under 21 years of age

PicturePlacement.text1: The maximum size of the uploaded photo should not exceed 240 KB
PicturePlacement.text2: NOTE: Do not upload photos taken at home. The picture must be taken in a photo salon.
PicturePlacement.text3: The width of the photo should be at least 600X600 pixels or 5x5sm
PicturePlacement.text4: The background of the photo must be white and clear.
PicturePlacement.text5: To crop and prepare the photo to the required size, <link>go here</link>.
PicturePlacement.title: Short rules for uploading photos:
